info.name: 使用同一项目自动创建MySQL资源申请-所有接口，未参数化

item.name: 资源申请prd
dev环境登录-monitor发起人

exec: pm.response.to.have.body('{"code":"1000","data":{"dbType":[{"text":"MySQL","value":"MySQL"},{"text":"Oracle","value":"Oracle"},{"text":"TiDB","value":"TiDB"},{"text":"MongoDB","value":"MongoDB"}],"env":[{"text":"PRD/UAT","value":"PRD/UAT"},{"text":"SIT","value":"SIT"},{"text":"DEV","value":"DEV"}],"status":[{"text":"草稿","value":1000},{"text":"审批中","value":1001},{"text":"审批通过","value":1002},{"text":"审批拒绝","value":1003}]},"msg":"操作成功"}');
